title: Solangi greets China on 74th national day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 01 (APP): Caretaker Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Murtaza Solangi on Sunday congratulated the People’s Republic of China on the occasion of its national day.
Using a social media account on X, the minister said: ” The people of Pakistan share the spirit of the festivities of the 74th National Day of the People’s Republic of China.”
“We hope this year and many years ahead of us will reinforce our all-weather relationship and promote peace and progress for us and the world at large”, he added.
